Restaurants.Name: Cherry Street Thai
Restaurants.Description: Compact, unassuming restaurant  preparing a range of traditional Thai fare with custom spice levels.

Restaurants.Name: Ezell’s Famous Chicken
Restaurants.Description: Local fast-food chain known for its housemade fried chicken, plus down-home sides & desserts.

Restaurants.Name: Pagliacci Pizza
Restaurants.Description: Laid-back chain pizzeria with gourmet thin-crust pies.

Restaurants.Name: McDonald’s
Restaurants.Description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers, fries & shakes.

Restaurants.Name: Starbucks
Restaurants.Description: Seattle-based coffeehouse chain known for its signature roasts, light bites and WiFi availability.

Restaurants.Name: Feed Co. Burgers
Restaurants.Description: An array of classic & creative burgers & sides in a casual, modern setting with outdoor seating.

Restaurants.Name: Cupcake Royale
Restaurants.Description: Cupcakes in many flavors, plus ice cream, ordered to go or stay in a plain cafe on a mellow street.

Restaurants.Name: IHOP
Restaurants.Description: Long-standing chain serving a wide variety of pancakes & other American breakfast & diner fare.

Restaurants.Name: Chipotle Mexican Grill
Restaurants.Description: Fast-food chain offering Mexican fare, including design-your-own burritos, tacos & bowls.

Restaurants.Name: Cafe Lago
Restaurants.Description: Ultrathin lasagna, wood-fired pizzas & other simple trattoria fare in a spare, open space.
